name: Let There Be Cough
description:
I Made This Game For Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, There Is Not Much To Tell, Game Is Small With 3 LVL Only, But I Put My Whole Heart In This Game Last Week And I Hope You Enjoy It.

//Small Description//

You Spread Virus By Cough Which Infects People. Infected People Will Panic And Spread Chaos(I Remember Something Similar Happening Last Year).

//Small Description//

!!!Weird Joke Alert!!!

Please Be Careful, Game Contains Weird Jokes Which Can Damage Your Brain Cells.

!!!Weird Joke Alert!!!

Thanks For Reading
